customers module

customers.charge_wallet(username)[source]

Add funds to a customer’s wallet.

Parameters:

username (str) – The username of the customer whose wallet is to be charged.

Returns:

Success message if wallet charging is successful.

Return type:

flask.Response

customers.deduct_wallet(username)[source]

Deduct funds from a customer’s wallet.

Parameters:

username (str) – The username of the customer whose wallet is to be deducted.

Returns:

Success message if deduction is successful.

Return type:

flask.Response

customers.delete_customer(username)[source]

Delete a customer.

Parameters:

username (str) – The username of the customer to delete.

Returns:

Success message if deletion is successful, or an error message if the customer is not found.

Return type:

flask.Response

customers.get_all_customers()[source]

Fetch all customers.

customers.get_customer(username)[source]

Fetch a customer by username.

Parameters:

username (str) – The username of the customer to fetch.

Returns:

Customer details if found, otherwise a ‘not found’ message.

Return type:

flask.Response

customers.register_customer()[source]

Register a new customer.

Returns:

Success message if registration is successful.

Return type:

flask.Response

customers.update_customer(username)[source]

Update a customer’s details.

Parameters:

username (str) – The username of the customer whose details are to be updated.

Returns:

Success message if update is successful.

Return type:

flask.Response
